name: Professional IT Services
tag_list: it-outsourcing, server-administration, server-management, webhosting, vps, website-development
overview:
Professional IT Services is an IT outsourcing company, located in Budapest, Hungary.

Professional IT Services provides a broad scale of IT outsourcing services: website development, webhosting, VPS, domain registration, high availability server management.

Outsourcing of information technology services helps your business to focus on its core activity. Our high skilled professionals help you to find solution to every imaginable demand and idea.

We provide even 99,9% SLA and 1 hour response time to our clients who operate high availability Linux, Oracle, PostgreSQL and MySQL servers.

For small websites we offer cost effective shared webhosting solutions! In our custom shared webhosting services we provide DNS, E-mail and Webhosting services.

Professional IT Services offers very flexible VPS solutions to performance hungry customers. For maximum flexibility, we give free hands to our clients to build their custom VPS.

Make your business attractive to your customers! We realize your dreams! We create custom designed and search engine optimized websites and webshops! Our professional team helps you to develop new websites, renew your old sites, and regurarly update your website!
